allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
chore: Reorganize project structure and prepare for school project

Major reorganization and cleanup:
- Move documentation to organized folders (docs/, __tests__/)
- Create backup versions of modified files (-Js-PC suffix)
- Clean up root directory structure
- Update middleware and components
- Prepare deployment configurations
- Add school project separation documentation

This commit establishes a clean baseline before implementing
the school project (Team/Coach/Player portal).

Related to SENG513 school project setup.
EOF
)")
